name: Corrupted Corridors
description:
Walkthrough infinite corridors in search of an escape.

Unlock the exit door by collecting all 3 keys.

At the moment the game is in a very early phase.  The majority of the time spent was experimenting with procedural generation.

Corrupted Corridors is a game made for a 3-day game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/vr-jan-jam).
